definitions.definition: The chemical element ( symbol Na ) with an atomic number of 11 and atomic weight of 22.990. It is a soft , waxy , silvery , reactive alkali metal that is never found unbound in nature.

main_definition: The chemical element ( symbol Na ) with an atomic number of 11 and atomic weight of 22.990. It is a soft , waxy , silvery , reactive alkali metal that is never found unbound in nature.
